column4: I decided to download ephiphany browser using the add/remove programs. I can't find it on my system though.
try in GNOME, left drop down menu, internet; if not there, go to terminal and type ephiphany like judgen said
try right clicking applications at the top right and see if there is an option to edit menu? might be under system -> preferences -> edit menu also
judgen: I figured it out. Thanks for the help. :)
